extension.news: [B][COLOR black]Update - v6.6.01 - Dec 28th, 2022[/COLOR][/B] --[SPECIAL THANKS][I] Special Thanks to TikiPeter(Fen) and u/Mammoth-Bullfrog-274. Both have contributed and helped a ton and without their help, Umbrella would not exist. It is appreciated.[I] --[INFORMATION][I] There are a lot of changes on this update. Testing has been done, but bugs always happen. Please report any issues.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] 17 to 35 color selections! "Buddy the Elf, What's your favorite color?"[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Playnext changed to allow for percentage or time or last subtitle time(even if subtitles are not used). [I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Playnext changed to allow themes to be used without skins.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Added color options for providers in source selection.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Adjusted Quality Icons[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Added plain icons to go with colors for quality on sources, can be turned off in settings.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Changed source selection to use artwork for background.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Added trending from tmdb for day and week for both movies and tv.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Full-Screen Scrape and Resolve[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Icon-Only Scrape and Resolve[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Changed progress to Umbrella Icon.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Adjusted Uncached Sources view and AH2 Playnext[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Added Watched Percentage Marking Option in setting Playback.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Added ability to hide or show fanart as background on source select and scraping screens.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Added ability to only try 1 link on source selection.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Simkl Authentication added. More Coming. Really no point authenticating, but more will be added in the next update.[I] --[ENHANCEMENT][I] Adjusted transparency on background art not being correct. Thanks Peter![I] --[FIX][I] Added red back changed defaults that were too high.[/I] --[FIX][I] IMDB Watchlists corrected.[/I] --[FIX][I] Removed test version detection to stop accidentally deleting trakt and settings.[I] --[FIX][I] Adding missing still watching file in for ah2 style playnext.[/I] --[FIX][I] Changed playnext subtitle check to check if already downloaded.[/I] --[FIX][I] Added enable/ disable for EasyNews.[I] --[FIX][I] Changed logging when set to kodi log to use higher level so debug logs show without enabling Kodi debug.[I] --[FIX][I] Info logging changed to debug.[I] --[FIX][I] Fixed error (blank settings) caused when checking settings for changes.[/I] --[FIX][I] Added setting for providers Trakt and TMDB for searches.[/I] --[FIX][I] Added widget refreshes to Trakt Scrobbles.[/I] --[FIX][I] Fixed a typo in TV Show Collection import from Trakt.[/I] --[FIX][I] Adjusted for issue with full-screen scrape and using library files.[/I]
